ISCO ON HIS WAY OUT?

Real Madrid have decided to sell attacking midfielder Isco in January in a move which could interest a number of Premier League sides, according to reports in Spain.

Spanish outlet El Confidencial say the 28-year-old could be on his way out of Madrid after falling out with manager Zinedine Zidane, with his contract up at the end of next season.

He has made just three starts in La Liga this season, and has been linked with Arsenal and Everton in the past.
